about_the_game:
After waking up in a zombie infested hospital you have no idea why you are there and how you got there and all you want is get out...

Project Z is a first person VR puzzle game with zombies. You have no means of defending yourself, instead you need to find your way around the zombies by locking them into rooms, luring them out of the way or playing them out against each other.

14 levels with a total playtime of about 1 hour.
NO grabbing of objects, instead you just press a button to interact.

content_descriptors.notes: The zombies in this game can be unexpected and scary. There are some blood stains and exploding zombies with green splatter. Zombies can also attack and kill the player who will just respawn at the beginning of the level.

detailed_description:
After waking up in a zombie infested hospital you have no idea why you are there and how you got there and all you want is get out...

Project Z is a first person VR puzzle game with zombies. You have no means of defending yourself, instead you need to find your way around the zombies by locking them into rooms, luring them out of the way or playing them out against each other.

14 levels with a total playtime of about 1 hour.
NO grabbing of objects, instead you just press a button to interact.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or comparable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Pro 460 or comparable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Project Z

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
